verses.text: وَٱلطُّورِ
verses.translation: By the mount
verses.transliteration: Waalttoori

verses.text: وَكِتَٰبٖ مَّسۡطُورٖ
verses.translation: And [by] a Book inscribed
verses.transliteration: Wakitabin mastoorin

verses.text: فِي رَقّٖ مَّنشُورٖ
verses.translation: In parchment spread open
verses.transliteration: Fee raqqin manshoorin

verses.text: وَٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡمَعۡمُورِ
verses.translation: And [by] the frequented House
verses.transliteration: Waalbayti almaAAmoori

verses.text: وَٱلسَّقۡفِ ٱلۡمَرۡفُوعِ
verses.translation: And [by] the heaven raised high
verses.transliteration: Waalssaqfi almarfooAAi

verses.text: وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ ٱلۡمَسۡجُورِ
verses.translation: And [by] the sea filled [with fire]
verses.transliteration: Waalbahri almasjoori

verses.text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٞ
verses.translation: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur
verses.transliteration: Inna AAathaba rabbika lawaqiAAun

verses.text: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٖ
verses.translation: Of it there is no preventer
verses.transliteration: Ma lahu min dafiAAin

verses.text: يَوۡمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوۡرٗا
verses.translation: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion
verses.transliteration: Yawma tamooru alssamao mawran

verses.text: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ سَيۡرٗا
verses.translation: And the mountains will pass on, departing
verses.transliteration: Wataseeru aljibalu sayran

verses.text: فَوَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers
verses.transliteration: Fawaylun yawmaithin lilmukaththibeena

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِي خَوۡضٖ يَلۡعَبُونَ
verses.translation: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves
verses.transliteration: Allatheena hum fee khawdin yalAAaboona

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.translation: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say]
verses.transliteration: Yawma yudaAAAAoona ila nari jahannama daAAAAan

verses.text: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: This is the Fire which you used to deny
verses.transliteration: Hathihi alnnaru allatee kuntum biha tukaththiboona

verses.text: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
verses.translation: Then is this magic, or do you not see
verses.transliteration: Afasihrun hatha am antum la tubsiroona

verses.text: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا فَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْ أَوۡ لَا تَصۡبِرُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do
verses.transliteration: Islawha faisbiroo aw la tasbiroo sawaon AAalaykum innama tujzawna ma kuntum taAAmaloona

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَنَعِيمٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure
verses.transliteration: Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatin wanaAAeemin

verses.text: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire
verses.transliteration: Fakiheena bima atahum rabbuhum wawaqahum rabbuhum AAathaba aljaheemi

verses.text: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do
verses.transliteration: Kuloo waishraboo haneean bima kuntum taAAmaloona

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ
verses.translation: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes
verses.transliteration: Muttakieena AAala sururin masfoofatin wazawwajnahum bihoorin AAeenin

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّبَعَتۡهُمۡ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَٰنٍ أَلۡحَقۡنَا بِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ وَمَآ أَلَتۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيِٕۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٞ
verses.translation: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained
verses.transliteration: Waallatheena amanoo waittabaAAathum thurriyyatuhum bieemanin alhaqna bihim thurriyyatahum wama alatnahum min AAamalihim min shayin kullu imriin bima kasaba raheenun

verses.text: وَأَمۡدَدۡنَٰهُم بِفَٰكِهَةٖ وَلَحۡمٖ مِّمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire
verses.transliteration: Waamdadnahum bifakihatin walahmin mimma yashtahoona

verses.text: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ
verses.translation: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin
verses.transliteration: YatanazaAAoona feeha kasan la laghwun feeha wala tatheemun

verses.text: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ
verses.translation: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected
verses.transliteration: Wayatoofu AAalayhim ghilmanun lahum kaannahum luluon maknoonun

verses.text: وَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other
verses.transliteration: Waaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdin yatasaaloona

verses.text: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ
verses.translation: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah]
verses.transliteration: Qaloo inna kunna qablu fee ahlina mushfiqeena

verses.text: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.translation: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire
verses.transliteration: Famanna Allahu AAalayna wawaqana AAathaba alssamoomi

verses.text: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful
verses.transliteration: Inna kunna min qablu nadAAoohu innahu huwa albarru alrraheemu

verses.text: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ
verses.translation: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman
verses.transliteration: Fathakkir fama anta biniAAmati rabbika bikahin wala majnoonin

verses.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ
verses.translation: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time
verses.transliteration: Am yaqooloona shaAAirun natarabbasu bihi rayba almanooni

verses.text: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.translation: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters
verses.transliteration: Qul tarabbasoo fainnee maAAakum mina almutarabbiseena

verses.text: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people
verses.transliteration: Am tamuruhum ahlamuhum bihatha am hum qawmun taghoona

verses.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe
verses.transliteration: Am yaqooloona taqawwalahu bal la yuminoona

verses.text: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful
verses.transliteration: Falyatoo bihadeethin mithlihi in kanoo sadiqeena

verses.text: أَمۡ خُلِقُواْ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ شَيۡءٍ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُونَ
verses.translation: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]
verses.transliteration: Am khuliqoo min ghayri shayin am humu alkhaliqoona

verses.text: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain
verses.transliteration: Am khalaqoo alssamawati waalarda bal la yooqinoona

verses.text: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]
verses.transliteration: Am AAindahum khazainu rabbika am humu almusaytiroona

verses.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ سُلَّمٞ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ فِيهِۖ فَلۡيَأۡتِ مُسۡتَمِعُهُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority
verses.transliteration: Am lahum sullamun yastamiAAoona feehi falyati mustamiAAuhum bisultanin mubeenin

verses.text: أَمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡبَنَٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Or has He daughters while you have sons
verses.transliteration: Am lahu albanatu walakumu albanoona

verses.text: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down
verses.transliteration: Am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muthqaloona

verses.text: أَمۡ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down
verses.transliteration: Am AAindahumu alghaybu fahum yaktuboona

verses.text: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan
verses.transliteration: Am yureedoona kaydan faallatheena kafaroo humu almakeedoona

verses.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him
verses.transliteration: Am lahum ilahun ghayru Allahi subhana Allahi AAamma yushrikoona

verses.text: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ
verses.translation: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up
verses.transliteration: Wain yaraw kisfan mina alssamai saqitan yaqooloo sahabun markoomun

verses.text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible
verses.transliteration: Fatharhum hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allathee feehi yusAAaqoona

verses.text: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped
verses.transliteration: Yawma la yughnee AAanhum kayduhum shayan wala hum yunsaroona

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ عَذَابٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know
verses.transliteration: Wainna lillatheena thalamoo AAathaban doona thalika walakinna aktharahum la yaAAlamoona

verses.text: وَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَاۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise
verses.transliteration: Waisbir lihukmi rabbika fainnaka biaAAyunina wasabbih bihamdi rabbika heena taqoomu

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَإِدۡبَٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.translation: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars
verses.transliteration: Wamina allayli fasabbihhu waidbara alnnujoomi
